meanings.sent1: The leaves were blawn away by the strong wind.

meanings.definition: (of a horn or trumpet) sounded loudly and forcefully
meanings.sent1: The blawn trumpet announced the arrival of the king.

meanings.definition: (of a person) moved by or as if by wind or air
meanings.sent1: She felt blawn by the gentle breeze on the beach.
